animation: 
    frames_per_second: 10    #(int) default 10
    time_steps_per_frame:  1     #(int) default 1
    save: true                  #(bool) default true
    result_dir: "results/"                #(str) default "results/" only used if save: True
simulation:     
    cell_size: 0.4                 #(double) in [m] default 1
    time_step: 0.2                 #(double) in [s] default 1
    duration:  100                 #(double) in [s] default 100
    population: "clones"        #(str {"clones" (default) |"similar"|"spread"})
    seed:  42                     #(int) default 42
    algorithm: "basic"                 #(str {"basic" (default) |"dijkstra"})

    initial_condition: | # Respect the ident!

        #   - 0     blank
        #   - 1     pedestrian
        #   - 2     target (exactly 1)
        #   - 3     obstacle
